0.title: Meta, Google, TikTok Must Face Schools’ Addiction Claims
0.summary: (Bloomberg) -- Meta Platforms Inc., Google, TikTok and Snap will have to face lawsuits brought by school districts in federal court blaming their “addictive” apps for contributing to a mental health crisis among students.
